name: Steel Arena
description:
WASD to move

Click on magnets surrounding the arena to move the boxes.

Right-Click to shoot.

The Swarm grows as you go on.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam #134: Magnets.

This is my first game jam submission. I still have a few unimplemented ideas such as character models, animations, more enemies, and maybe a small puzzle element. Sadly these were cut for low time. Still had fun making this. It was a good change having a short deadline to have a completed project, rather than allowing myself to focus on an aspect of a personal project for 12 hours and not get much done. Thank you for playing my submission!
